webServices.description: Manage ALM integrations

actions.description:
Import a GitLab project to SonarQube, creating a new project and configuring MR decoration.
Requires the 'Create Projects' permission

webServices.description: Manage ALM settings

actions.description:
Bind a GitLab instance to a project.
If the project was already bound to a previous Gitlab ALM instance, the binding will be updated to the new one.Requires the 'Administer' permission on the project

webServices.description: Handle authentication. NOT_IN_CLI

actions.description: Authenticate a user.
Logout a user.
Check credentials.

webServices.description: Get information on Compute Engine tasks.

actions.description:
Search for tasks.
Requires the system administration permission, or project administration permission if componentId is set.

changelog.description: field "pullRequest" added
fields "branch" and "branchType" added
field "logs" is deprecated and its value is always false
it's no more possible to specify the page parameter.

params.description: Id of the component (project) to filter on

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string
Must not be set together with componentId.
Deprecated and replaced by 'q'
Maximum date of end of task processing (inclusive)
Filter on the last tasks (only the most recent finished task by project)
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 1000

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string
  • task ids that are exactly the same as the supplied string
Must not be set together with componentId
Comma separated list of task statuses

actions.description:
Get the pending tasks, in-progress tasks and the last executed task of a given component (usually a project).
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified component.
Either 'componentId' or 'component' must be provided.

changelog.description: fields "branch" and "branchType" added
field "logs" is deprecated and its value is always false

actions.description:
Give Compute Engine task details such as type, status, duration and associated component.
Requires 'Administer System' or 'Execute Analysis' permission.
Since 6.1, field "logs" is deprecated and its value is always false.

changelog.description: fields "branch" and "branchType" added

params.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response.

webServices.description: Get information about a component (file, directory, project, ...) and its ancestors or descendants. Update a project or module key.

actions.description: Search for components

params.description: Language key. If provided, only components for the given language are returned.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • BRC - Sub-projects
  • DIR - Directories
  • FIL - Files
  • TRK - Projects
  • UTS - Test Files

actions.description:
Returns a component (file, directory, project, view…) and its ancestors. The ancestors are ordered from the parent to the root project. The 'componentId' or 'component' parameter must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the project of the specified component.

changelog.description: 'branch' is added to the response
'version' is added to the response
Leak period date is added to the response
Analysis date has been added to the response
The field 'id' is deprecated in the response
The 'visibility' field is added to the response

actions.description:
Navigate through components based on the chosen strategy. The componentId or the component parameter must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Browse' on the specified project.
When limiting search with the q parameter, directories are not returned.

changelog.description: The field 'id' is deprecated in the response

params.description: Base component key. The search is based on this component.
Base component id. The search is based on this component.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • BRC - Sub-projects
  • DIR - Directories
  • FIL - Files
  • TRK - Projects
  • UTS - Test Files

Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned
  • all: return all the descendants components of the base component. Grandchildren are returned.
  • leaves: return all the descendant components (files, in general) which don't have other children. They are the leaves of the component tree.

webServices.description: Manage custom measures for a project. See also api/metrics.

actions.description:
Create a custom measure.
The project id or the project key must be provided (only project and module custom measures can be created). The metric id or the metric key must be provided.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the project.

params.description:
Measure value. Value type depends on metric type:
  • INT - type: integer
  • FLOAT - type: double
  • PERCENT - type: double
  • BOOL - the possible values are true or false
  • STRING - type: string
  • MILLISEC - type: integer
  • DATA - type: string
  • LEVEL - the possible values are OK, WARN, ERROR
  • DISTRIB - type: string
  • RATING - type: double
  • WORK_DUR - long representing the number of minutes

actions.description:
Delete a custom measure.
Requires 'Administer System' permission or 'Administer' permission on the project.

List custom measures. The project id or project key must be provided.
Requires 'Administer System' permission or 'Administer' permission on the project.

params.description: Comma-separated list of the fields to be returned in response. All the fields are returned by default.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

actions.description:
Update a custom measure. Value and/or description must be provided
Requires 'Administer System' permission or 'Administer' permission on the project.

params.description:
Measure value. Value type depends on metric type:
  • INT - type: integer
  • FLOAT - type: double
  • PERCENT - type: double
  • BOOL - the possible values are true or false
  • STRING - type: string
  • MILLISEC - type: integer
  • DATA - type: string
  • LEVEL - the possible values are OK, WARN, ERROR
  • DISTRIB - type: string
  • RATING - type: double
  • WORK_DUR - long representing the number of minutes

webServices.description: Get duplication information for a project.

actions.description: Get duplications. Require Browse permission on file's project

changelog.description: The fields 'uuid', 'projectUuid', 'subProjectUuid' are deprecated in the response.

params.description: File ID. If provided, 'key' must not be provided.

webServices.description: Manage SonarSource commercial editions. NOT_IN_CLI

actions.description: Apply changes to SonarQube to match the specified license. Clear error message of previous automatic install of an edition, if there is any. Require 'Administer System' permission.
Clear error message of last install of an edition (if any). Require 'Administer System' permission.
Preview the changes to SonarQube to match the specified license. Requires 'Administer System' permission.
Provide status of SonarSource commercial edition of the current SonarQube. Requires 'Administer System' permission.
Uninstall the currently installed edition. Requires 'Administer System' permission.

webServices.description: Manage user favorites

actions.description:
Add a component (project, directory, file etc.) as favorite for the authenticated user.

Remove a component (project, directory, file etc.) as favorite for the authenticated user.

Search for the authenticated user favorites.
Requires authentication.

the response field components.uuid is deprecated. Use components.key instead.

actions.description:
Edit a comment.

the response field components.uuid is deprecated. Use components.key instead.
the response returns the issue with all its details
the 'key' parameter has been renamed comment

params.exampleValue: Won't fix because it doesn't apply to the context

actions.description:
Search for issues.
At most one of the following parameters can be provided at the same time: componentKeys, componentUuids, components, componentRootUuids, componentRoots.
Requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project(s).

changelog.description: parameters 'projects', 'projectUuids', 'moduleUuids', 'directories', 'fileUuids' are marked as internal
response field 'email' is renamed 'avatar'
response fields 'reporter' and 'actionPlan' are removed (drop of action plan and manual issue features)
parameters 'reporters', 'actionPlans' and 'planned' are dropped and therefore ignored (drop of action plan and manual issue features)
response field 'debt' is renamed 'effort'

params.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response. Action plans are dropped in 5.5, it is not returned in the response.
To retrieve assigned or unassigned issues
Comma-separated list of assignee logins. The value '__me__' can be used as a placeholder for user who performs the request
Comma-separated list of component keys. Retrieve issues associated to a specific list of components (and all its descendants). A component can be a portfolio, project, module, directory or file.
If used, will have the same meaning as componentUuids AND onComponentOnly=false.
If used, will have the same meaning as componentKeys AND onComponentOnly=false.

To retrieve issues associated to a specific list of components their sub-components (comma-separated list of component IDs). This parameter is mostly used by the Issues page, please prefer usage of the componentKeys parameter. A component can be a project, module, directory or file.
If used, will have the same meaning as componentKeys AND onComponentOnly=true.

To retrieve issues created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.
If this parameter is set, createdSince must not be set
Datetime to retrieve issues created during a specific analysis

To retrieve issues created before the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

To retrieve issues created during a time span before the current time (exclusive). Accepted units are 'y' for year, 'm' for month, 'w' for week and 'd' for day. If this parameter is set, createdAfter must not be set

Choose the returned value for facet items, either count of issues or sum of debt.
Since 5.5, 'debt' mode is deprecated and replaced by 'effort'

Comma-separated list of the facets to be computed. No facet is computed by default.
Since 5.5, facet 'actionPlans' is deprecated.
Since 5.5, facet 'reporters' is deprecated.
Comma-separated list of languages. Available since 4.4

Return only issues at a component's level, not on its descendants (modules, directories, files, etc). This parameter is only considered when componentKeys or componentUuids is set. Using the deprecated componentRoots or componentRootUuids parameters will set this parameter to false. Using the deprecated components parameter will set this parameter to true.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500
To match resolved or unresolved issues
Comma-separated list of coding rule keys. Format is <repository>:<rule>

To retrieve issues created since the leak period.
If this parameter is set to a truthy value, createdAfter must not be set and one component id or key must be provided.

Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned

webServices.description: Manage notifications of the authenticated user

actions.description:
Add a notification for the authenticated user.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • Authentication if no login is provided. If a project is provided, requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project.
  • System administration if a login is provided. If a project is provided, requires the 'Browse' permission on the specified project.

params.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

Notification type. Possible values are for:
  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

actions.description:
List notifications of the authenticated user.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • Authentication if no login is provided
  • System administration if a login is provided

Remove a notification for the authenticated user.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • Authentication if no login is provided
  • System administration if a login is provided

params.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

Notification type. Possible values are for:
  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

webServices.description: Manage permission templates, and the granting and revoking of permissions at the global and project levels.

actions.description:
Add permission to a group.
This service defaults to global permissions, but can be limited to project permissions by providing project id or project key.
The group name or group id must be provided.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified project

params.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, profileadmin, gateadmin, scan, provisioning
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, user

actions.description:
Add a group to a permission template.
The group id or group name must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

params.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, user

actions.description:
Add a project creator to a permission template.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

params.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, user

actions.description:
Add permission to a user.
This service defaults to global permissions, but can be limited to project permissions by providing project id or project key.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified project

params.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, profileadmin, gateadmin, scan, provisioning
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, user

actions.description:
Add a user to a permission template.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

params.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, user

actions.description:
Apply a permission template to one project.
The project id or project key must be provided.
The template id or name must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

Apply a permission template to several projects.
The template id or name must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

webServices.description: Manage the plugins on the server, including installing, uninstalling, and upgrading.

actions.description:
Get the list of all the plugins available for installation on the SonarQube instance, sorted by plugin name.
Plugin information is retrieved from Update Center. Date and time at which Update Center was last refreshed is provided in the response.
Update status values are:
  • COMPATIBLE: plugin is compatible with current SonarQube instance.
  • INCOMPATIBLE: plugin is not compatible with current SonarQube instance.
  • REQUIRES_SYSTEM_UPGRADE: plugin requires SonarQube to be upgraded before being installed.
  • DEPS_REQUIRE_SYSTEM_UPGRADE: at least one plugin on which the plugin is dependent requires SonarQube to be upgraded.
Require 'Administer System' permission.

Cancels any operation pending on any plugin (install, update or uninstall)
Requires user to be authenticated with Administer System permissions

Installs the latest version of a plugin specified by its key.
Plugin information is retrieved from Update Center.
Requires user to be authenticated with Administer System permissions

params.description: The key identifying the plugin to install

actions.description: Get the list of all the plugins installed on the SonarQube instance, sorted by plugin name.

changelog.description: The fields 'compressedHash' and 'compressedFilename' are added
The 'filename' field is added
The 'fileHash' field is added
The 'sonarLintSupported' field is added
The 'updatedAt' field is added

params.description:
Comma-separated list of the additional fields to be returned in response. No additional field is returned by default. Possible values are:
  • category - category as defined in the Update Center. A connection to the Update Center is needed

actions.description:
Get the list of plugins which will either be installed or removed at the next startup of the SonarQube instance, sorted by plugin name.
Require 'Administer System' permission.

Uninstalls the plugin specified by its key.
Requires user to be authenticated with Administer System permissions.

params.description: The key identifying the plugin to uninstall

actions.description:
Updates a plugin specified by its key to the latest version compatible with the SonarQube instance.
Plugin information is retrieved from Update Center.
Requires user to be authenticated with Administer System permissions

params.description: The key identifying the plugin to update

actions.description:
Lists plugins installed on the SonarQube instance for which at least one newer version is available, sorted by plugin name.
Each newer version is listed, ordered from the oldest to the newest, with its own update/compatibility status.
Plugin information is retrieved from Update Center. Date and time at which Update Center was last refreshed is provided in the response.
Update status values are: [COMPATIBLE, INCOMPATIBLE, REQUIRES_UPGRADE, DEPS_REQUIRE_UPGRADE].
Require 'Administer System' permission.

webServices.description: Removed since 6.3, please use api/qualityprofiles instead

actions.description:
Get a profile.
The web service is removed and you're invited to use api/qualityprofiles/search instead

Get a list of profiles.
The web service is removed and you're invited to use api/qualityprofiles/search instead

webServices.description: Manage project analyses.

actions.description:
Create a project analysis event.
Only event of category 'VERSION' and 'OTHER' can be created.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified project

Delete a project analysis.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the project of the specified analysis

Delete a project analysis event.
Only event of category 'VERSION' and 'OTHER' can be deleted.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified project

Search a project analyses and attached events.

actions.description:
Bulk update a project or module key and all its sub-components keys. The bulk update allows to replace a part of the current key by another string on the current project and all its sub-modules.
It's possible to simulate the bulk update by setting the parameter 'dryRun' at true. No key is updated with a dry run.
Ex: to rename a project with key 'my_project' to 'my_new_project' and all its sub-components keys, call the WS with parameters:
  • project: my_project
  • from: my_
  • to: my_new_
Either 'projectId' or 'project' must be provided.
Requires one of the following permissions:
  • 'Administer System'
  • 'Administer' rights on the specified project

webServices.description: Get system details, and perform some management actions, such as restarting, and initiating a database migration (as part of a system upgrade).

actions.description: Temporarily changes level of logs. New level is not persistent and is lost when restarting server. Requires system administration permission.

params.description: The new level. Be cautious: DEBUG, and even more TRACE, may have performance impacts.

actions.description:
Display the database migration status of SonarQube.
State values are:
  • NO_MIGRATION: DB is up to date with current version of SonarQube.
  • NOT_SUPPORTED: Migration is not supported on embedded databases.
  • MIGRATION_RUNNING: DB migration is under go.
  • MIGRATION_SUCCEEDED: DB migration has run and has been successful.
  • MIGRATION_FAILED: DB migration has run and failed. SonarQube must be restarted in order to retry a DB migration (optionally after DB has been restored from backup).
  • MIGRATION_REQUIRED: DB migration is required.

Provide health status of SonarQube.

Require 'Administer System' permission or authentication with passcode

  • GREEN: SonarQube is fully operational
  • YELLOW: SonarQube is usable, but it needs attention in order to be fully operational
  • RED: SonarQube is not operational
Get system logs in plain-text format. Requires system administration permission.

Migrate the database to match the current version of SonarQube.
Sending a POST request to this URL starts the DB migration. It is strongly advised to make a database backup before invoking this WS.
State values are:
  • NO_MIGRATION: DB is up to date with current version of SonarQube.
  • NOT_SUPPORTED: Migration is not supported on embedded databases.
  • MIGRATION_RUNNING: DB migration is under go.
  • MIGRATION_SUCCEEDED: DB migration has run and has been successful.
  • MIGRATION_FAILED: DB migration has run and failed. SonarQube must be restarted in order to retry a DB migration (optionally after DB has been restored from backup).
  • MIGRATION_REQUIRED: DB migration is required.
Answers "pong" as plain-text
Restart server. Require 'Administer System' permission. Perform a full restart of the Web, Search and Compute Engine Servers processes.

Get state information about SonarQube.

status: the running status

  • STARTING: SonarQube Web Server is up and serving some Web Services (eg. api/system/status) but initialization is still ongoing
  • UP: SonarQube instance is up and running
  • DOWN: SonarQube instance is up but not running because migration has failed (refer to WS /api/system/migrate_db for details) or some other reason (check logs).
  • RESTARTING: SonarQube instance is still up but a restart has been requested (refer to WS /api/system/restart for details).
  • DB_MIGRATION_NEEDED: database migration is required. DB migration can be started using WS /api/system/migrate_db.
  • DB_MIGRATION_RUNNING: DB migration is running (refer to WS /api/system/migrate_db for details)

Lists available upgrades for the SonarQube instance (if any) and for each one, lists incompatible plugins and plugins requiring upgrade.
Plugin information is retrieved from Update Center. Date and time at which Update Center was last refreshed is provided in the response.

webServices.description: Get details on test files. See also api/sources. Deprecated since 5.6.

actions.description: Get the list of source files covered by a test. Require Browse permission on test file's project

changelog.description: "branch" field is now returned

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.

actions.description:
Get the list of tests either in a test file or that test a given line of source code.
Requires 'Browse' permission on the file's project.
One (and only one) of the following combination of parameters must be provided:
  • testId - get a specific test
  • testFileId - get the tests in a test file
  • testFileKey - get the tests in a test file
  • sourceFileId and sourceFileLineNumber - get the tests that cover a specific line of code
  • sourceFileKey and sourceFileLineNumber - get the tests that cover a specific line of code

changelog.description: "filePullRequest" field is now returned

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500
ID of source file. Must be provided with the source file line number.
Key of source file. Must be provided with the source file line number.
Source file line number. Must be provided with the source file ID or key.

webServices.description: Removed since 6.3, please use api/measures/search_history instead

actions.description: The web service is removed and you're invited to use api/measures/search_history instead

webServices.description: Manage user groups.

actions.description:
Add a user to a group.
'id' or 'name' must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

changelog.description: It's no longer possible to add a user to the default group

actions.description:
Create a group.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

params.description: Description for the new group. A group description cannot be larger than 200 characters.
Name for the new group. A group name cannot be larger than 255 characters and must be unique. The value 'anyone' (whatever the case) is reserved and cannot be used.

actions.description:
Delete a group. The default groups cannot be deleted.
'id' or 'name' must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

Remove a user from a group.
'id' or 'name' must be provided.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

Search for user groups.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

changelog.description: Paging response fields moved to a Paging object
'default' response field has been added

params.description: Comma-separated list of the fields to be returned in response. All the fields are returned by default.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500
Limit search to names that contain the supplied string.

actions.description:
Update a group.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

changelog.description: The default group is no longer editable

params.description: New optional description for the group. A group description cannot be larger than 200 characters. If value is not defined, then description is not changed.

New optional name for the group. A group name cannot be larger than 255 characters and must be unique. Value 'anyone' (whatever the case) is reserved and cannot be used. If value is empty or not defined, then name is not changed.

actions.description:
Search for users with membership information with respect to a group.
Requires the following permission: 'Administer System'.

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.
Limit search to names or logins that contain the supplied string.
Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

webServices.description: Removed since 6.3, please use api/favorites and api/notifications instead

actions.description: This web service is removed

webServices.description: List, create, and delete a user's access tokens.

actions.description:
Generate a user access token.
Please keep your tokens secret. They enable to authenticate and analyze projects.
If the login is set, it requires administration permissions. Otherwise, a token is generated for the authenticated user.

params.description: User login. If not set, the token is generated for the authenticated user.

actions.description:
Revoke a user access token.
If the login is set, it requires administration permissions. Otherwise, a token is generated for the authenticated user.

List the access tokens of a user.
The login must exist and active.
If the login is set, it requires administration permissions. Otherwise, a token is generated for the authenticated user.

webServices.description: Manage users.

actions.description: Update a user's password. Authenticated users can change their own password, provided that the account is not linked to an external authentication system. Administer System permission is required to change another user's password.

params.description: Previous password. Required when changing one's own password.

actions.description:
Create a user.
If a deactivated user account exists with the given login, it will be reactivated.
Requires Administer System permission

changelog.description: The password is only mandatory when creating local users, and should not be set on non local users
The 'infos' message is no more returned when a user is reactivated

params.description: Specify if the user should be authenticated from SonarQube server or from an external authentication system. Password should not be set when local is set to false.
User password. Only mandatory when creating local user, otherwise it should not be set
List of SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.
Comma-separated list of SCM accounts. This parameter is deprecated, please use 'scmAccount' instead

actions.description: Deactivate a user. Requires Administer System permission

Lists the groups a user belongs to.
Requires Administer System permission.

changelog.description: Paging response fields moved to a Paging object
'default' response field has been added

params.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.
Limit search to group names that contain the supplied string.
Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

actions.description:
Get a list of active users.
Administer System permission is required to show the 'groups' field.
When accessed anonymously, only logins and names are returned.

changelog.description: Paging response fields moved to a Paging object
Avatar has been added to the response
Email is only returned when user has Administer System permission

params.description: Comma-separated list of the fields to be returned in response. All the fields are returned by default.
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500
Filter on login, name and email

actions.description: Update a user. If a deactivated user account exists with the given login, it will be reactivated. Requires Administer System permission

changelog.description: User's password can only be changed using the 'change_password' action.

params.description: SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.
This parameter is deprecated, please use 'scmAccount' instead

webServices.description: Webhooks allow to notify external services when a project analysis is done

actions.description:
Create a Webhook.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

params.description: Name displayed in the administration console of webhooks
The key of the project that will own the webhook

Server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload, for example 'http://my_server/foo'. If HTTP Basic authentication is used, HTTPS is recommended to avoid man in the middle attacks. Example: 'https://myLogin:myPassword@my_server/foo'

actions.description:
Delete a Webhook.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

params.description: The key of the webhook to be deleted,auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

actions.description:
Get the recent deliveries for a specified project or Compute Engine task.
Require 'Administer' permission on the related project.
Note that additional information are returned by api/webhooks/delivery.

params.description: Id of the Compute Engine task
Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less than 500
Key of the webhook that triggered those deliveries,auto-generated value that can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

actions.description:
Get a webhook delivery by its id.
Require 'Administer System' permission.
Note that additional information are returned by api/webhooks/delivery.

Search for global webhooks or project webhooks. Webhooks are ordered by name.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

Update a Webhook.
Requires 'Administer' permission on the specified project, or global 'Administer' permission.

params.description: new url to be called by the webhook
The key of the webhook to be updated,auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list
